sentences.sContent: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.sCn: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.sContent: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.sCn: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.sContent: Stone is filming the final instalment of his Vietnam trilogy.
sentences.sCn: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.sContent: the final stages in their relationship
sentences.sCn: 他们之间关系的最后阶段

sentences.sContent: They scored in the final minutes of the game.
sentences.sCn: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.sContent: The final whistle (= blown at the end of a game ) was only seconds away when Redknapp equalised.
sentences.sCn: 雷德克纳普将比分扳平的时候，离终场哨声吹响只剩几秒钟了。

synos.tran: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版

phrases.pCn: 最终报告；总结报告；决算报告
验收；最终验收；最后验收

words.tran: 结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行

trans.tranOther: last in a series of actions, events, parts of a story etc
the last and most important game, race, or set of games in a competition
